channel.title: Dusting it off
channel.description:
For the most part, I've personally removed a number of locked threads that have served little to no purpose on the forum. I've also removed a lot of useless threads that haven't been locked. And as for active-useless threads, I've only locked them to let users know the reason. I will later remove those when I have time.
For the future, the staff encourages everyone to read over the rules of each section. This ESPECIALLY goes for the [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,51.0.html]Server Tutorials[/url], [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,125.0.html]Server Development[/url], and [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,149.0.html]Development Team[/url] categories. The rules in each of these sections have been ignored tremendously, and I have no doubt that a majority of the users have never even looked at the rules in those sections.
So, enjoy the somewhat cleaned forum. We'll never completely clean everything, but we always try our best.
- Moparscape Staff

item.title: Dusting it off
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
